entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 08:00 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 14 except 10 near Lake Superior.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High 14 except 10 near Lake Superior. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
